note: To allow comparisons between countries and over time the death rate from unsafe sanitation metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). The GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices.
title: Rate of deaths attributed to unsafe sanitation vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: The estimated annual number of deaths attributed to [unsafe sanitation](#dod:unsafe_sanitation) per 100,000 individuals. Gross domestic product (GDP) per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
sourceDesc: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
